description: HTML file containing embedded JavaScript that defines a Calculator service class, registers methods, and initializes a service manager to connect to a server.

classes.name: Calculator
classes.description: A JavaScript class extending Service, providing 'add' and 'sub' methods for remote invocation.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Calculates the sum of parameters and returns a Promise resolving with the result.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Calculates the difference between two parameters and returns a Promise resolving with the result.
